--- Testing vblendps (blend packed single-precision floats) ---
Imm: 00000000 (0x00)
Result: 1.100000 2.200000 3.300000 4.400000 5.500000 6.600000 7.700000 8.800000 

Imm: 11111111 (0xFF)
Result: 9.900000 10.100000 11.110000 12.120000 13.130000 14.140000 15.150000 16.160000 

Imm: 01010101 (0x55)
Result: 9.900000 2.200000 11.110000 4.400000 13.130000 6.600000 15.150000 8.800000 
Result: 0x411E6666 0x400CCCCD 0x4131C28F 0x408CCCCD 0x4152147B 0x40D33333 0x41726666 0x410CCCCD 

Imm: 01010101 (0x55)
Result: 1.100000 10.100000 3.300000 12.120000 5.500000 14.140000 7.700000 16.160000 
Result: 0x3F8CCCCD 0x4121999A 0x40533333 0x4141EB85 0x40B00000 0x41623D71 0x40F66666 0x418147AE 

--- Boundary Test (Imm: 0xAA) ---
Expected: inf nan nan inf -0.000000 0.000000 99999996802856924650656260769173209088.000000 3.000000

vblendps test passed
